name: Cupid's Rising
description:
Hello lovers!

Ever wanted to play cupid and bless someone with relentless, tender love ? 

Ever wanted to be a badass archer?

Ever wished to attend a school dance?

Today's your day, sweetheart c;

Enjoy Cupid's Rising, a first person shooter game where you sir (ma'am, brother, amigo), 

get to massacre young teen hearts with L O V E. 

For the best game experience, download the PC build below!
